away_team_total_fifa_points.description: Total FIFA points of the away team

away_team_score.description: Score of the away team in the match

city.description: City where the match took place

country.description: Country where the match took place

neutral_location.description: Whether the match took place at a neutral location

value_dict.False: The match did not take place at a neutral location

shoot_out.description: Whether the match went to a shoot out

value_dict.No: The match did not go to a shoot out
value_dict.Yes: The match went to a shoot out

value_dict.Lose: The home team lost the match
